叏字的基本解释

叏
guái
古同“夬”。

叏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guài］
［《廣韻》古邁切，去夬，見。］
亦作“叏1”。
(1)《易》卦名。六十四卦之一，乾下兑上。
(2)坚决；果断。
[②]［jué］
［《集韻》古穴切，入屑，見。］
亦作“叏2”。通“決1”。
(1)钩弦用的扳指。
(2)决定（胜负）。

叏字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【又字部】　叏； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页165第23
【唐韻】古賣切【集韻】【韻會】古邁切【正韻】古壞切，?音怪。【說文】分?也。【易·叏彖】叏，?也，剛?柔也。又【集韻】【韻會】?古穴切，音玦。【集韻】所以闓弦者。【韻會】詩?拾旣佽。【註】本作叏，今文作?。?拾，射韝縱弦者曰?，拾箭者曰拾。【集韻】或作?。

Basic explanation of words
叏
guái
Gu Tong is "夬".
叏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guài］
["Guangyun" Gu Maiqie, go to 夬, see you. ]
Also known as "叏1".
(1) The hexagram name of "Yi". One of the sixty-four hexagrams, dry down and redeem up.
(2) Resolute; decisive.
[②]［jué］
["Jiyun" ancient acupoint cut, into the scraps, see. ]
Also known as "叏2". Pass "Decision 1".
(1) The finger used for hooking.
(2) Decide (win or lose).
叏

[Subset 2] [The Department of Words] 　叏; Kangxi Strokes: 5; Page Number: Page 165 Page 23
[Tang Yun] Ancient selling cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ancient Mai cut [Zheng Yun] Ancient bad cut, strange sound. [Said the text] points? Also. 【Yi·Talking】Hey, it's hard and soft. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Ancient acupoint cut, Yin Jue. [Jiyun] So the one who has the string. [Rhyme Club] Poetry? Picking up the poems. [Note] This is a 叏叒, this article is a ?. "Pick up," the one who shoots the long string said?, the one who picks up the arrow said to pick up. [Ji Yun] Or make?.
